name: Bomba.JS
tagline: An Automatic JS-Based State Computing Workflow Engine.
body:
![alt tag](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/shinexavier/BombaJS/master/BombaJSLogo.png "Bomba.JS")

The name "Bomba.JS" was chosen to pay homage to one of the finest historical work on computation that paved way to Turing Machines and beyond where we exist and continue to model our world upon.

Deepest homage to those mathematicians led by Marian Rejewski, Jerzy Różycki, Henryk Zygalski, Alan Turing and many others at Bletchley Park who fought a war, without fighting, with their intellect and relentless pursuit for excellence and survival.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
